# Core Rule 4 - No sexual or shock content and references [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
This is a zero-tolerance rule.
Erotic roleplay (ERP) and sexual language are prohibited.
Although SS14 includes shocking themes such as gore, drug abuse, and suicide, do not add more details than necessary for roleplay and in-game mechanics.
## Examples [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Using common insults such as "asshole," "shit," and "motherfucker." - Using common emotes such as "[italic]claps,[/italic]" "[italic]flips you off,[/italic]" and "[italic]blows a raspberry.[/italic]" - Describing gore within in-game physiology.
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Speaking or acting sexually in any context. - Referencing genitalia, reproductive acts, or toiletry acts. - Describing gore with more detail than possible within in-game physiology.
